title: The Art of Making Onigiri
description: è‹±Ah, onigiri! It's as if the Japanese said, "Forget sandwiches and their rules!" and opted to encase their leftovers in a rice ball, inventing the perfect snack for the indolent, the rebellious, and those who just can't muster the effort.
